item.title: How do i tranfer this into a banner
item.dc:creator: @gmaster1440 gmaster1440
item.description:
@gmaster1440 wrote:

Looks to me like a desperate attempt to embed a flash file onto a website.
The following is an example on how to embed a file t your website from YouTube:

<object width="425" height="350"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/MkqjwUtWvfg"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/MkqjwUtWvfg" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" width="425" height="350"></embed></object>

All you have to do is change the

http://www.youtube.com/v/MkqjwUtWvfg

to your own .swf file so it would look like:

<object width="425" height="350"><param name="movie" value="jj.swf"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed src="jj.swf" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" width="425" height="350"></embed></object>

Read full topic
item.source: How do i tranfer this into a banner
